snippet: BRUSTEIN--Irene, 95 years young, passed away on January 12th, predeceased by her loving husband Isidore Brustein M.D., and adored brother, Dr. Harold Schwartz. The loving mother of Roberta/Mark Bergman and Caren Brustein and adoring grandmother of James Ferber, she will be remembered for her fashion flair, love of books and keen interest in current affairs. If there's a Ferragamo boutique in heaven, Irene is already there buying up a storm! Our thanks to her wonderful companion, Bientu Traore and the staff of The 80th Street Residence. There will be a private service. 1/3
